```{r}
bshare<- read.csv("D:/Fall 2022 Term 2/DS 803/Project/Bike Share Data/hour", header = TRUE, sep = ',')

attach(bshare)

#Offense Code 900 is Arson, 3115 is Investigate Person
n<- length(Crime$OFFENSE_CODE)
filler<-rep(NA,n-1)
arson_count<- 0
arson_hour_count<-0

for (i in 1:n)
{
  if(Crime$OFFENSE_CODE[i]==3115)
  {
    arson_count = arson_count + 1
  }
}

for (i in 1:n)
{
  if(Crime$OFFENSE_CODE[i]==3115 && Crime$HOUR[i] == 12)
  {
    arson_hour_count = arson_hour_count + 1
  }
}

arson_count
arson_hour_count


#Plotting the # of incidents per hours
Crime_plotter<-rep(0,24)
for(j in 1:24)
{
  for(i in 1:n)
  {
    if(Crime$OFFENSE_CODE[i]==3115 && Crime$HOUR[i] == j)
  {
    Crime_plotter[j] = Crime_plotter[j] + 1
  }
}
}
Crime_plotter
plot(Crime_plotter, ylab= "Incident Count", xlab = "Hour of the Day", col="black")+
abline(mean(Crime_plotter),seq(0,24), col = "blue")


```
